item.title: Libbitcoin kernel
item.description: Questions and Answers Q: bitcoind and bitcoin-qt linked against kernel the libary in the future? presenter: yes, that is a / the goal Q: Have you looked at an electrum implementation using libbitcoinkernel? audience: yes, would be good to have something like this! audience: Also could do the long proposed address index with that? audience: not only address index, other indexes too. Q: Other use-cases: audience: be able to run stuff on iOS Q: Should the mempool be in the kernel?
